biography: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  Cerina Vincent (born February 7, 1979) is an American film actress, and model best known for playing the Yellow Ranger Maya in the television series Power Rangers: Lost Galaxy, a naked foreign exchange student in Not Another Teen Movie, and Marcy in Cabin Fever. She is considered a scream queen.  Description above from the Wikipedia article Cerina Vincent , licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Cerina Vincent
